alert.note: Alert for Kahoolawe; Kipahulu; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; South Haleakala; South Maui, Upcountry; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 3:31PM HST until January 12 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR MAUI AND BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR ALL OTHER AREAS EXCEPT WINDWARD BIG ISLAND... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... .WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts near 50 mph. * WHERE...Maui County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
